text: hamaare paigambar (mohammad) jo kuchh unapar unake paravaradigaar kee taraph se naazil kiya gaya hai us par eemaan lae aur unake (saath) momineen bhee (sabake) sab khuda aur usake farishton aur usakee kitaabon aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lae (aur kahate hain ki) ham khuda ke paigambaron mein se kisee mein tafaraqa nahin karate aur kahane lage ai hamaare paravaradigaar hamane (tera irashaad) suna
